title: The Oberoi Group enters Travel + Leisure’s Hall of Fame
description: The Oberoi, Marrakech has secured the distinction of being named the best resort in North Africa and the Middle East for two consecutive years, while Wildflower Hall, Shimla in the Himalayas—an Oberoi Resort has earned the title of best resort in India.
